entry.title: Kivy - introduction
entry.summary:
Description

'Kivy - Open source Python library for rapid development of applications that make use of innovative user interfaces, such as multi-touch apps.' Let's see if Kivy is worth our attention, how rapid is 'rapid' and why Kivy isn't as popular in native apps world as Django in webdev universe. I'll introduce basics: from installation and hello world app, to more complex app and building .apk package (yay, mobile!).
